mapper.select: SELECT l.post_id AS postId, l.user_num AS userNum, m.user_nickname AS authorNickname, p.title, p.content, p.created_date AS createdDate, f.file_path AS thumbnail FROM likes l LEFT OUTER JOIN posts p ON l.post_id = p.post_id LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON l.user_num = m.user_num LEFT OUTER JOIN fileat f ON p.post_id = f.post_id WHERE l.user_num = #{userNum} AND p.is_deleted = '0' ORDER BY l.post_id DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes l LEFT OUTER JOIN posts p ON l.post_id = p.post_id WHERE l.user_num = #{userNum} AND p.is_deleted = '0'
SELECT file_path FROM fileat WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND file_order = 0
